name: Richard H. YOUNG, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES FIDELITY & GUARANTY COMPANY
name_abbreviation: Young v. United States Fidelity & Guaranty Co.

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: Richard H. YOUNG, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES FIDELITY & GUARANTY COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed. 299 Pa.Super. 237, 445 A.2d 542.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David Faust, Allan C. Molotsky, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
455 A.2d 635
Richard H. YOUNG, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES FIDELITY & GUARANTY COMPANY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 24, 1983.
Decided Feb. 1, 1983.
Fred Lowenschuss, Philadelphia, for appellant.
David Faust, Allan C. Molotsky, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
